description.@en: A life spent in the saddle has brought me much, including an empathetic bond with horses.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: When you fail a Handle Animal or Ride Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome. In addition, when using the Movement subtype of Riding, you do not have to add the additional 1 Action Point cost.
